$meta.title: Sample Block Header (Annotated)
$meta.description: Human-readable JSON view of a block header. Canonical wire format is CBOR per docs/spec/BLOCK_FORMAT.md; this JSON is for docs and tooling examples.
notes: All 0x-hex fields are byte strings; lengths are enforced by the CDDL schema.
The header hash is sha3-256 over the canonical CBOR-encoded header map.
Θ (Theta) is represented as thetaMicro (µ-nats) for fixed-point stability.
mixSeed binds entropy across rounds (e.g., beacon/prev header) for PoIES.

annotations./header/chainId: Network identifier. Must match node/DB chain params.
annotations./header/height: Block number starting at 0 for genesis.
annotations./header/parentHash: sha3-256 of the parent header CBOR bytes.
annotations./header/roots/stateRoot: Canonical state Merkle root after applying this block.
annotations./header/roots/txRoot: Merkle root of transactions included in this block.
annotations./header/roots/proofsRoot: Aggregated root over PoIES proof receipts.
annotations./header/roots/daRoot: Namespaced Merkle Tree (NMT) root for data availability.
annotations./header/thetaMicro: Current difficulty threshold Θ in µ-nats (fixed-point).
annotations./header/mixSeed: Entropy seed mixed from prior beacon/header domains.
annotations./header/nonce: Miner nonce used for HashShare u-draw; length per spec domain.
annotations./header/timestamp: Producer-set UNIX seconds; bounded/skew-checked by consensus.
annotations./header/policy/poiesPolicyRoot: Hash (Merkle) of current PoIES policy document.
annotations./hashes/header_cbor_hex: Deterministic CBOR encoding of the header map.
annotations./hashes/headerHash: Canonical header hash used for indexing/fork-choice.
